department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: beaked bird of prey at one end, grasping two writhing ungulates in its silvered claws; large dragon head with silvered, spiraling horns terminating in a dragon-headed hook; composition surrounds small green jade bi disc, centered with a seven-eyed glass disc; fiver smaller glass discs set into the bronze; eyes of two main animal heads inlaid with glass; backed by sheet of silver with gilt bronze stud for attachment
title: Garment Hook
